Text: Clamp the carburetor Fuel Tube [Hose Pinching Pliers].
Put Gasoline Container under the Carburetor Drain Tube.
Loosen (but do not remove) Carburetor Drain Screw and drain fuel into Gasoline Container [Flat Head Screwdriver]. (Audible Call Out)
Tighten the Carburetor Drain Screw securely [1/8 in. Flat Head Screwdriver].
Remove Gasoline Container from under the Carburetor Drain Tube.

Caution: Pry the Carburetor Fuel Tube off gently to avoid damaging it.

Text: Detach Carburetor Fuel Tube from Carburetor [Flat Head Screwdriver].
Check that the tube routing configuration matches Figure. (Audible Call Out)
Pull Carburetor Drain Tube upwards from red plastic housing until bottom end is free.
Remove tube from fitting at bottom of Carburetor Bowl.
Remove Right Hand Vent Tube from Carburetor.
Remove Left Hand Vent Tube from Carburetor.
Remove Carburetor by sliding it off of the bolts attaching it to the main unit.
